meta.title: Singing Lessons London • Louise Macphail • Singing Teacher
meta.description: Welcome to Singing Lessons London. I'm Louise and I'm a professional singing teacher offering personalized lessons in the London area.
meta.keywords: Singing Lessons London, Singing Teacher London, London Singing Teacher

header.title: Singing Lessons London
header.intro: Hello! I'm Louise Macphail and I'm a professional singing teacher offering personalized lessons to all ages and abilities in the London area.

about.missionText1: Alongside teaching I am a professional singer with many years of experience performing live. I am often delighted to pass the knowledge and techniques I've learned to my students on a daily basis.
about.missionText2: I have had experience in performing, writing and teaching in a huge selection of genres, however I specialize in singing Pop, Soul and RnB.

prices.title: Prices:
prices.details: Lessons are pay-as-you-go, weekly, fortnightly or as suits you.

teachingSpace.title: Teaching Space
teachingSpace.description: I teach the majority of my lessons from a dedicated teaching studio in the SE8 3PT area. I also offer lessons via Skype & Zoom and mobile tuition.

cta.getInTouch: Get in touch to book your first lesson with me today.
